name: Fierce Body wave 5A  Grade Brazilian hair 20" inch 1B Color 100g
description:
100% Virgin Human Brazilian Body Wave weft Hair extension can be colored or bleached and heat dried after washing.
Styling requirement suggestions- 3 packs required for full weave. 2 packs required for half weave, 1 pack required for clip in Hair Extensions.

After Care - Shampooing and Conditioning use hair serum or leave in conditioning for best results when styling.

Coloring - Seek professional Hair dressing advice or if you are home coloring yourself follow the manufacturers guidelines.

Fierce luxury Hair Extensions will not be held responsible or liable for any hair coloring or styling mistakes. Hair Extensions are non refundable or will not be exchanged if used or colored. If too many packs are purchased in error they will not be exchanged or refunded this is due to hygiene reasons they cannot be returned once leaving the warehouse.
